name: At Noon: Duels
description:
Take part in gunslingers duels!

Try beat in duel other gunslingers who already played the game and their reaction times are saved on server.
When you won - your result also will be saved in rank!

How to play: 

1.Take out gun by pressing shown key

2.Shot your enemy faster than he shots you

Have fun!

v1.0 in development, made as Unity training in two days

Assets:

Music: https://soundcloud.com/ijessejames/jesse-james-interlude-1

Graphics: opengameart.org
